long_description: The Asolo Piuma hiking boots provide exceptional support, amazing breathability, and all-day comfort. They're a great choice for warm-weather hiking. Water-resistant suede leather uppers with high-tenacity nylon underlays deliver durable flexibility and support while remaining breathable. Wicking nylon velveteen linings absorb and disperse excess moisture for fast drying. Gusseted scree tongues and padded ankle cuffs add protective comfort at ankles; rubber toe bumpers protect against impact and abrasion. Lightweight molded EVA midsoles provide cushioning comfort and shock absorption. Thermoplastic urethane plates offer torsional rigidity and support. Vibram(R) rubber/EVA blend outsoles are optimized for weight savings without compromising traction for handling mixed terrain.
short_description: The Asolo Piuma hiking boots provide exceptional support, amazing breathability, and all-day comfort. They're a great choice for warm-weather hiking.
